name: Colziand
startIntroPart1: Oh Raymond! You who formed a nation of people for God to saved, glorious you are. Thanks be to the mighty Father.
startIntroPart2: Will you once more rule the world for the Lord's desire.
attacked: I'm dissapointed! Why declare destruction, is there no fun in peace and prosperity?
defeated: Colziand is its people, me, and Him.
introduction: Kumusta sa'inyo. O estranghero, saan ka galing?
hateHello: You speak in pride, I don't wanna hear it
tradeRequest: It appears that you have a golden interest of our goods
uniqueText: Adopting new Policy branch may trigger Social Change event in your Capital, which will provide Free Technology once completed.

name: Salumi
startIntroPart1: Be welcomed, princesses. You lead the beatiful and joyful nation of Salumi, a country filled more women than men with great cultural and bio diversity. ...One, two, three! Three had been the attempts to break free - getting terribly punished - but with determination, Salumi emerged to a great nation. Since the start we had a ton of great political division, which brought many problems and conflicts, but despite all the troubles, Salumi ought to help other, no matter what. The conflicts didn't cease until early 21st century, where the sun finally rises over Salumi to achieve greatness.
startIntroPart2: Princesses, your people want you to lead them to greatness. They want you to convert them in to the best nation. Will you answer the call? Can you fight and triump over the adversities? Can you build a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
declaringWar: Prepare to lose your empire of opression!
attacked: You will see how fruitless this will be for you. Wait and see.
defeated: I hope you treat my people good, donÂ´t take away their happiness.
introduction: Greetings! This is Salumi, our wordeful land. Want a kiss?
tradeRequest: I  thought you might be intested in this...

name: Mandalore
startIntroPart1: Yo, Mando. So now, your gonna rule over all your people of Mandalore? Ever since you defeated Moff Gideon and won the darksaber, Bo Katan Kryze now wants you lead the new Mandalore.
startIntroPart2: Mando, I mean Din Djarin. Are you up for the battle to restore Mandalore?
declaringWar: I could bring you in warm or I could bring you in cold?
defeated: I guess this is the way.
introduction: Greetings! I am a Mandalorian, you can hire us for work.
hateHello: You have the guts to meet me?!
tradeRequest: Hey, I think we can agree on this
uniques: 67% chance to earn 25 Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit from a conquered encampment
50% chance of capturing defeated Barbarian naval units and earning 25 Gold

name: Maid Empire
startIntroPart1: Hail Empire! All hail for the maid! It's time to make the world look back, it's time to control the world! Maid is not lowly job, we will build new order for the world. It time to rise all sisters!
startIntroPart2: The Empire is led by Maria, represent for all the maid. With assistance from all maid and their old master, the Empire hopes to bring respect to Maid, and set the new rule for the world. Can they the reach it and become the winners?
declaringWar: For the Empire, we will defeat you.
attacked: U fu fu fu fu....., so you chose the war.
defeated: So, we lost, but us will never fail.
introduction: Hi, I am Maria Campbell, the Maid.
hateHello: You again? I don't want to see you now.
tradeRequest: I have something want to trade with you.
uniques: +[15]% combat bonus for units fighting in [Friendly Land]

name: Cannetalhion
startIntroPart1: High & high it be the roar to our king of our ancestors realm. This land where we stand, where our ancestors fought and lost blood & soul. We have kept it out of alien invaders. Who want our people dead for our difference from themselves, should we dominate the outsiders or become allies with them for a nation of nations that has been prophesied for a long time. It was when our rebellious past, left the one and only truth. Then came that from domination of those who stray in our lands to a change of letting them in our lands and giving them great hospitality
startIntroPart2: Prince, O' Future King! Lead us like your heirs and those who lead us before you.
declaringWar: Our ancesters were not yet much of a civilization but barbarians, we shall vanquish you and become greater than ever.
introduction: High Hello to you. To our wonderful realm, have you come to join our might?
tradeRequest: High Hello to you, I have something to trade with ya.
uniques: 67% chance to earn 25 Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit from a conquered encampment
Receive a free Social Policy when you advance to the next era
Receive free [Merchant of Awesomeness] when you discover [Optics]
When a city is conquered, gain a free Technology. Gaining a city through a trade deal does not count
Adopting new Policy branch may trigger Social Change event in your Capital, which will provide Free Technology once completed.
50% chance of capturing defeated Barbarian naval units and earning 25 Gold

cities.name: Edinburgh
cities.declaringWar: You shall stain this land no longer with your vileness! To arms, my countrymen - we ride to war!
cities.attacked: Traitorous man! The Celtic peoples will not stand for such wanton abuse and slander - I shall have your head!
cities.defeated: Vile ruler, know that you 'won' this war in name only!

cities.name: Dublin
cities.declaringWar: War lingers in our hearts. Why carry on with a false peace?
cities.attacked: You gormless radger! You'll dine on your own teeth before you set foot in Ireland!
cities.defeated: A lonely wind blows through the highlands today. A dirge for Ireland. Can you hear it?
